products_page_description: Wide range of SANY truck cranes for various tasks
products_meta_description: SANY truck cranes from 30 to 100 tons — reliable equipment for construction and industry. InterTransService — official distributor in Kazakhstan.
products_cta_description: Our specialists will help you choose the optimal equipment for your tasks
product_sany_30_short_desc: Three-axle crane for urban and small construction sites with high flexibility and fast transportation.
product_sany_30_feature_3: Innovative frame tested for 200,000 fatigue cycles
product_sany_30_feature_4: CAN bus system with fast response
product_sany_50_short_desc: Powerful truck crane with high efficiency and stability for medium construction projects.
product_sany_50_feature_3: Precise control with min speed of 1.2 m/min
product_sany_80_short_desc: Heavy truck crane on special chassis for large industrial and construction sites.
product_sany_100_short_desc: Flagship high-capacity crane on robust chassis with all-wheel steering functions.
product_sany_30_full_description:
Higher flow rate provides higher efficiency, such as faster rope winding speed. Shunt mode of independently controlled combined movements provides higher stability, such as simultaneous vibration-free lowering and lifting of loads.

Electro-hydraulic control system ensures efficient flow distribution, quick response to combined movements and low impact, energy-saving and environmentally friendly. Precise control: Excellent jog mode performance, min. stable single rope speed 1.2 m/min and min. stable slewing speed 0.1°/s, ensuring precise mm-level lifting. Built-in slewing buffer control: booster buffer, sequential braking and free-run technology. Smooth start and stop.

Innovative structural frame, tested for 200,000 fatigue cycles, ensures high reliability.

CAN Bus System:
Controllers, displays, counters, I/O modules, sensors etc. are integrated into CAN bus network and respond quickly.
Fault Diagnosis System:
Working device with intelligent controller, body with BCM module accurately identifying fault location, making maintenance convenient.
SANY load moment indicator system provides protection against overload, over-release, over-winding.

Simple wiring and stable signal transmission. Automatic real-time monitoring of operating conditions.

product_sany_100_full_description:
High capacity crane mounted on robust chassis. Some all-wheel steering functions.

Higher flow ensures higher efficiency, such as faster rope winding speed. Shunting mode of independently controlled combined movements ensures higher stability, such as simultaneous vibration-free jib and hoist operation.

Electro-hydraulic control system ensures efficient flow distribution, quick response to combined movements and low impact, energy-saving and environmentally friendly. Precise control: Excellent jog mode performance, min. stable single rope speed 1.2 m/min and min. stable slewing speed 0.1°/s, ensuring precise mm-level lifting. Built-in slewing buffer control: booster buffer, sequential braking and free-run technology. Smooth start and stop.

Innovative structural frame, tested for 200,000 fatigue cycles, ensures high reliability.

CAN Bus System:
Controllers, displays, counters, I/O modules, sensors etc. are integrated into CAN bus network and respond quickly.
Fault Diagnosis System:
Working device with intelligent controller, body with BCM module accurately identifying fault location, making maintenance convenient.
SANY load moment indicator system provides protection against overload, over-release, over-winding.
